message.raw:
Updated novatech to use connection_table properties as it should.
Added a new option "default_baud_rate" which when set tells labscript that
the novatech will start with that baud rate and should be return to it when
shut down.  We accept the possibility that the baud rate is already set, so
errors in setting the baud rate are ignored.
